import React from "react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { useRouter } from "next/dist/client/router"; import { Row, Col, Divider, Space, PageHeader, Tooltip } from "antd"; import { dummy } from "../../../../../utils/dummy"; import { getChapter } from "../../../../../redux/actions/storiesActions"; import Comments from "../../../../../components/chapter/Comments"; import CharacterCard from "../../../../../components/common/CharacterCard"; import LocationCard from "../../../../../components/common/LocationCard"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; const Chapter = (props) => { const router = useRouter(); React.useEffect(() => { props.getChapter(router.query.id, router.query.chapid); }, [router.query.id, router.query.chapid]); return (
router.push(`/story/${router.query.id}`)} title="Back to story" />

1. Chapter 1

{dummy.name}

Posted on August 20, 2020
